category.name: ProductView
category.category_description: Preferences affecting the behavior of Product views

preference.name: Vis_PV_ImageCaptureHeight
preference.preference_description: Defines the height in pixel of the preview image created when saving a Product View from the Lifecycle Visualization application. This is only used if "Image Capture" is enabled for Product View save, and if the "Use Image Export Dialog" option is unchecked. Valid values are positive integer from 1 to 1040. Specifying a value of 0 for either width or height will result in both values being calculated automatically.
